The image in question was broadcasted by: including Zee News, TV9Gujarati, ABN Telugu, and TV9BharatVarsh, claiming it to be the first visual of the Hyderabad encounter.
The image had a watermark stating: FIRST ON ZEE NEWS" and was accompanied by an anchor's statement mentioning that Zee News brings exclusive visuals of the police action.
Alt News: an investigative organization, found that the image actually dates back to 2015 and was published in an article by The Hindu, titled "20 woodcutters from TN gunned by A.P. police."
